scripts.uglify: mkdirp dist/assets/scripts && uglifyjs app/common/scripts/*.js -m -o dist/assets/scripts/app.js && uglifyjs app/common/scripts/*.js -m -c -o dist/assets/scripts/app.min.js
scripts.icons: svgo -f app/common/icons && mkdirp dist/assets/images/icons && svg-sprite-generate -d app/common/icons -o dist/assets/images/icons/icons.svg
scripts.build:js: npm run scripts && npm run uglify
scripts.build:css: npm run styles && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:images: npm run images && npm run icons
scripts.build: parallelshell "npm run build:css" "npm run build:js" "npm run build:images" "npm run templates"
scripts.watch: parallelshell "npm run server" "npm run watch:templates" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.production: npm run clear && npm run build && npm run copy
